markdownRemark.html: Mariann has a passion for the management of thyroid disorders and T2DM. She recognizes the unique individual needs of her patients and strives to give them the best possible care, working closely with them to achieve optimal health. She believes in health promotion and preventative care through education and by encouraging lifestyle improvements.

frontmatter.title: Mariann, AGNP-BC
frontmatter.meta_description: Mariann has a passion for the management of thyroid disorders and T2DM.
